data.message:
Hey there,

Been trying to edit/change the name of my company`s page for a while now. Was a joint venture with someone, hence the company name consisted -in part- of our names, however since said someone left the venture, his name as part of the page is now misleading, and distracting to the customers. As I`ve tried to change the name multiple times without any success, and even wrote numerous letters as a response to the rejection of my requests, explaining the issue with the name of the page -goes without saying, I`ve never received a reply-, I would like to get assistance with my issue asap.

Thanks in advance.

replies.message: Hey, Alexandra. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2cB1oGi. Thanks! -Rhea

place unblock account facebook me
Thadepo9@gmail.com

Dear Rhea,

Thanks for the quick answer. However as you may see from my attached images, your suggestion lead to another dead end. I would  really like to get this issue sorted asap, as the  name is misleading, and the root of many misunderstandings. Thanks in advance.

P.S.: I know realize that I can not attach a picture here, but the point is, my query got the following reply: "We are not actyvely monitoring messages sent to this page. However, you can ask your question on the page itself or visit https ://www.facebook.com/buisness/resources for further support options.
Did they ever help you out Alexandra Elbert
